A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
When i first saw it i gave it  4.5 of 5. After seeing it the first time I ended up watching a ton of online reviews and angry fan reactions and my opinion started to sour.  I was starting to feel like I might have been to easy on it's faults. 

I decided to rewatch the original trilogy and I've just seen the last jedi for a 2nd time.  I went in thinking that i'd hate it and was ready to nitpick it apart.  But low and behold\, watching it again just reaffirmed that my first impression was correct. In fact\, I feel even better about it since some of the "faults" were me just missing certain dialog.  Final Score is still 4.5/5

Id rank this 3rd overall
